title: Bloomberg's Ambrosio on VW Settling Cheating Claims (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Ambrosio on VW Settling Cheating Claims (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Patrick Ambrosio, Environmental Reporter for Bloomberg BNA, on VW agreeing to pay $14.7 billion to settle its claims from the cheating scandal, one of the nation’s largest consumer class-action settlements on record.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
